t: KIngs County Tools brand | BladeForums.com
s: Just ordered a Cold Steel Riflemans 'hawk on Amazon . Made in Taiwan $36 Then I stumbled across a Kings County Hatchet, made in Germany $45 The KC hatchet looks very much like a tomahawk, Has a nail pull slot, The striking face is beefier. 9 bux more seems worth it to get German vs Taiwan product I think I will also order the Kings hatchet to compare side by side with the CS, then return what I'm not happy with. Anyone own any Kings County cutting tools...
